headline: The Lowe’s Companies’ (LOW) Resilient Business Model and its Importance for Retail Dividend Stocks
summary: Lowe’s Companies, Inc. (NYSE:LOW) is included among the 12 Best Retail Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. Lowe’s Companies, Inc. (NYSE:LOW) has been operating for over a hundred years and was once the top home improvement retailer in the US. Today, it stands as the second-largest behind Home Depot, with more than 1,700 stores nationwide. […]

headline: Here's Why This Analyst Prefers Lowe's Stock to Home Depot's
summary: Shares of both home improvement retailers appear to be based on potentially overly optimistic near-term sales numbers, Oppenheimer said.
